title: The zoning of lands within local authorities‘ area / special planning authorities‘ areas shall be governed by zoning / proposals shown in the Development Plan / Planning proposal / Plan
clause_text: The zoning of lands within local authorities‘ area / special planning authorities‘ areas shall be governed by zoning / proposals shown in the Development Plan / Planning proposal / Plan. Remaining area of the district where such plan is not sanctioned shall be treated as Agricultural zone. All the provisions of this UDCPR shall be applicable with following additions.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
